properties.name: Amrita A Sanctuary for Yoga
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing   4515 Southwest Corbett Avenue, Portland, OR, 97239Amrita A Sanctuary for Yoga 503-552-9642. Amrita is the sweet nectar of the heart, the nectar of purification arising from the practice of yoga.

properties.name: Bikram Yoga College of India
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing  5816 Southwest Hood Avenue, Portland, OR, 97239Bikram Yoga College of India 503-452-1132 Welcome to Bikram’s Yoga College of India - John’s Landing, the oldest Bikram studio in Portland. Bikram Yoga is a fun, challenging and invigorating 90-minute workout designed to improve your physical strength, balance and flexibility. The series features two breathing exercises and 26 hatha yoga postures, practiced in a heated room. Our certified Bikram Yoga teachers will encourage and inspire you to do your best. Through regular practice, you’ll discover the true meaning of yoga—the union of mind, body, and spirit. Start your journey today! "Never too old, never too sick, never too bad, never too late to start from scratch and begin again." - Bikram Choudhury

properties.name: Bikram's Yoga College of India
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing  7070 Southeast 16th Avenue, Portland, OR, 97202Bikram\'s Yoga College of India 503-232-9642

properties.name: Bikram's Yoga College of India
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing  4831 Northeast Fremont Street, Portland, OR, 97213Bikram\'s Yoga College of India 503-284-0555 Bikram\'s Beginning Hatha Yoga is a scientifically formulated series of 26 postures and two breathing exercises. Bikram worked with his teacher, Bishnu Ghosh, to create a series of postures designed to heal the body from chronic illness and/or injury and to maintain the body in a healthy condition. Bikram stresses that by "healing the body" he means removing the symptoms of ill health. Bikram\'s Yoga is therefore both rehabilitative and preventative.
